q: legislator Chris Bryant , who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Chris Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. OAKLAND

New York Post reported. Ken Auletta , author of`` Googled: The End of the World as We Know It,'' told Bloomberg TV that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the Obama administration. Maybe he'll find some kind of astonishing offer, either at a startup or at a foundation or from a political unit, but today, he's hanging on to the right to define his job as he sees fit while continuing to make a pile of money, said Whit Andrews, a Shrewsbury, Mass.-based analyst at Gartner Inc.`` Why wouldn't you stay?
